answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hi Susan,
I have been able to find the current supervisor to employee ratio for the Sanitation Department of New York. Last year, the span of control ratio was changed from 7:1 to 12:1 under the Agency Gap Closing Programs although the decision has been criticized. You can read an article on that decision here: http://nydn.us/caozyK 
I hope this is helpful, 
Pooja Varma
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org
